Source code structures¶

Source¶

PlaneWave¶

class PyRI.ExpData.ExpData(name)[source]¶

The ExpData class is used to import experimental data from the locally saved data.

Arguments: name – the name of the material you wish to import

GetEC(wl)[source]¶

Returns the extinction coefficient of the material from the experimental data given the wavelength used.

Arguments: wl – wavelength

GetRI(wl)[source]¶

Returns the refractive index of the material from the experimental data given the wavelength used.

Arguments: wl – wavelength

PlotExpData(ri=True, ec=True)[source]¶

Plots the experimental data of the material.

Arguments: ri – plot the refractive index as a function of the wavelength ec – plot the extinction coefficient as a function of the wavelength
